description.value:
You adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty. Choose one of the following options from the appropriate class list. You can't take a Fighting Style option more than once, even if you later get to choose again.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.8YwPFv3UAPjWVDNf]{Archery}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.zSlV0O2rQMdoq6pB]{Defense}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.hCop9uJrWhF1QPb4]{Dueling}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.mHcSjcHJ8oZu3hkb]{Two Weapon Fighting}
